    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicFileList

        public BasicFileList()
        The root is assumed to be the top node. (On windows there is more than one root, as each driver is considered as one different file system. On linux there is always one root: '/'.)
        Parameters:
        topFolder - The path to the top folder, where the file list will begin.
